subject: Problems with assertEquals...
msgSnippet: I can t seem to figure out why this is failing without diving into the source code for junit or the JDK. I m using JDK 131_08 and trying to call assertEquals
messageBody:
I can't seem to figure out why this is failing without diving into the
source code for junit or the JDK. I'm using JDK 131_08 and trying to
call assertEquals to compare two java.util.Date objects. The values are
the same but assertEquals thinks they are different. Any ideas? I know
it's calling the equals method so it should pass unless I'm missing
something.

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: expected:<Tue Apr 06 14:11:24 EDT
2004> but was:<Tue Apr 06 14:11:24 EDT 2004>
at
org.scra.emall.moes.rdbms.MILSTRIPBeanTest.assertEquals(MILSTRIPBeanTest
.java:81)
at
org.scra.emall.moes.rdbms.MILSTRIPBeanTest.testPersistence(MILSTRIPBeanT
est.java:58)
at com.intellij.rt.execution.junit2.JUnitStarter.main(Unknown Source)
at com.intellij.rt.execution.application.AppMain.main(Unknown Source)


Grant
